S

scores - Variable in class Scoring
Contains the scores for each row of the scorecard for the given hand
Scoring - Class in <Unnamed>
Class for determining the scores associated with each row on the scorecard for a given hand
Scoring(Hand, Player) - Constructor for class Scoring
EVC for the scoring class
setBonusCut() - Method in class Player
Set the bonus cutoff value (this value corresponds to an average value of three dice for each of the upper scorecard rows)
setChosenRow(String, ArrayList<Integer>) - Method in class Player
Sets the final scorecard value to the value that the player received on a given hand on a given row that they want to use for the round
setKeep(char) - Method in class Die
Sets the keep field
setUserStr(String) - Method in class Hand
Sets the user input
SMALL_STRAIGHT_SCORE - Static variable in class Scoring

straits() - Method in class Scoring
Determine whether the roll has a small or large straight
sumDice() - Method in class Hand
